articles.author: Neuroscience News
articles.title: Oxytocin's Role in Learning Birdsong Revealed - Neuroscience News
articles.description: The study offers insights into the neurochemistry of social learning and draws parallels with language acquisition in humans.
articles.content:
Summary: Oxytocin, the hormone known as the “love hormone,” influences how young zebra finches learn to sing by mimicking older birds.
The study offers insights into the neurochemistry of social lea… [+9715 chars]
